Posts.EditableText: My name is Domenyk, a 23 year old American male voice actor looking to help you with any character voices in your games. As I am still fairly new to this scene, I'm looking to do everything free, just ask for credit and a little something to add to my portfolio. If you want to spice up your game or need a voice, please feel free to message me. Thank you for reading, have a good day!
Posts.HTML: My name is Domenyk, a 23 year old American male voice actor looking to help you with any character voices in your games. As I am still fairly new to this scene, I'm looking to do everything free, just ask for credit and a little something to add to my portfolio. If you want to spice up your game or need a voice, please feel free to message me. Thank you for reading, have a good day!
